site_name: Adjoining Borough Observations Within The Corporation Of London
description: Observations on a proposed development within the adjoining Borough of City of London with respect to the redevelopment of a site including the Museum of London Rotunda and Bastion House, 140 - 150 London Wall. The proposed development comprises demolition of the existing buildings and erection of three new buildings for office, culture, community and retail uses; formation of new basement areas; reconfiguration of the existing gyratory;reconfiguration of the access/egress arrangements for London Wall Car Park; removal of existing areas of the highwalk and formation of new areas of highwalk and the provision of new public realm and landscaping at London Wall West, Bastion House And Museum of London, 140-150 London Wall, EC2
